1195960.name: Visual Novel Maker - Zombie Voice Pack
1195960.description:
Not only do zombies need brains... they need voices too! This expansive sound pack will give your zombies everything they need to say, groan and moan before chowing down on their next victim. 146 vocal sound effects performed by 2 different voice actors, featuring sounds that are also suitable for beasts, other monsters and similar fantasy creatures.

Features:

* 146 vocal sound effects interpreted by two different voice actors divided in:
- Dialogue
- Attacking (different intensities)
- Dying
- Suffering pains (different intensities)
- Emotions (laughs, angry, etc..)
- Zombie sounds (moans, suffering, gasping, etc...)
* Recorded by professional voice actors
* Intuitive file naming
* All you'll ever need regarding Zombie vocal sounds
* For use with Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:
